name: exact_url_non_english
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool best_backlink_checker_api.
Tool description: Best Backlink checker, You can check Top backlinks, New backlinks, Poor Backlinks, etc
API description: Retrieves the backlinks of a specific non-English URL using the RapidAPI service.

domain.description: The domain of the non-English URL for which to retrieve backlinks.
